Control Name: Implements Alerts to Analyze Anomalies—Management implements alerts that are communicated to personnel for analysis to identify environmental threat events.

control_attributes.Control: Implements Alerts to Analyze Anomalies—Management implements alerts that are communicated to personnel for analysis to identify environmental threat events.
control_attributes.SubCategory: A1.2 The entity authorizes, designs, develops or acquires, implements, operates, approves, maintains, and monitors environmental protections, software, data back-up processes, and recovery infrastructure to meet its objectives.
